location: 經貿二路 (Jingmao 2nd Road), near Nangang Software Park MRT Station
notes: Excellent condition unit on 8th floor with 24-hour hotel-style management and elevator. Three-sided natural lighting with green river views is ideal for a baby. Building appears modern with comprehensive amenities. Includes parking. Note: No pets allowed. The high floor with balcony warrants checking railing safety during viewing.
